allow: Bash(python -c "import zipfile; z=zipfile.ZipFile\(r''C:\\Users\\Ankush\\.m2\\repository\\de\\jensd\\fontawesomefx\\8.2\\fontawesomefx-8.2.jar''\); [print\(n\) for n in z.namelist\(\) if ''FontAwesomeIcon'' in n and n.endswith\(''.class''\)]")

Bash(powershell -Command "& { Add-Type -AssemblyName ''System.IO.Compression.FileSystem''; $jar = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\(''C:\\Users\\Ankush\\.m2\\repository\\de\\jensd\\fontawesomefx\\8.2\\fontawesomefx-8.2.jar''\); $entry = $jar.GetEntry\(''de/jensd/fx/glyphs/fontawesome/FontAwesomeIcon.class''\); $stream = $entry.Open\(\); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader\($stream\); $bytes = New-Object byte[] $entry.Length; $stream.Read\($bytes, 0, $entry.Length\) | Out-Null; $text = [System.Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetString\($bytes\); $matches = [regex]::Matches\($text, ''[A-Z_]{3,}''\); foreach\($m in $matches\) { if\($m.Value -match ''CALENDAR|FILE_|SLIDER''\) { Write-Host $m.Value } }; $stream.Close\(\); $jar.Dispose\(\) }")
